task.title: Include extension point dependencies in the processing pipeline

section.title: Defining extension points for future processing
section.draft-comment: give ability for other plugins to extend processing at points during the pipeline of your plugin. best practice to add pre- and post- processing extension points
target needs to use dita:depends and dita:extension attributes

pd.draft-comment: use instead of depends to specify extension point dependencies for integration.

pd.p: The dita:extension attribute is used to process attributes in elements which are not in template extension namespace. The value of the attribute is a space delimited tuple, where the first item is the name of the attribute to process and the second item is the action ID.

dlentry.dd: Ant target dependency list is processed to replace all target names which start with an open curly bracket and end with a close curly bracket. The value of the extension point is the ID between the curly brackets.
